originContent: AppCUI-rs is a fast, cross-platform Rust library for building modern, text-based user interfaces (TUIs) with rich widgets, themes, and full Unicode support‚Äîan alternative to ncurses and other terminal UI frameworks.
translatedContent: AppCUI-rs √© uma biblioteca Rust r√°pida e multiplataforma para construir interfaces de usu√°rio modernas baseadas em texto (TUIs) com widgets ricos, temas e suporte total a Unicode‚Äîuma alternativa ao ncurses e outros frameworks de UI para terminal.

originContent: - [x] multiple out-of-the-box controls (buttons, labels, text boxes, check boxes, radio buttons, list views, tree views, combo boxes, date/time pickers, color pickers, tabs, accordeons, etc.). A full list of controls can be found [here](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/chapter-3/stock_controls.html)
translatedContent: - [x] m√∫ltiplos controles prontos para uso (bot√µes, r√≥tulos, caixas de texto, caixas de sele√ß√£o, bot√µes de r√°dio, listas, √°rvores, combos, seletores de data/hora, seletores de cor, abas, acorde√µes, etc.). Uma lista completa de controles pode ser encontrada [aqui](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/chapter-3/stock_controls.html)

originContent: - [x] powerful layout system that allows you to position controls using absolute coordinates, relative coordinates, docking, alignment, anchors or pivot positioning (see more [here](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/chapter-3/layout.html))
translatedContent: - [x] sistema de layout poderoso que permite posicionar controles usando coordenadas absolutas, relativas, dock, alinhamento, √¢ncoras ou posicionamento por piv√¥ (veja mais [aqui](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/chapter-3/layout.html))

originContent: - [x] multi-platform support (Windows via API and virtual terminal, Linux via ncurses, MacOS via termios)
translatedContent: - [x] suporte multiplataforma (Windows via API e terminal virtual, Linux via ncurses, MacOS via termios)

originContent: - [x] multi-threading support to allow background tasks
translatedContent: - [x] suporte a multi-threading para tarefas em segundo plano

originContent: - [x] predefined dialogs (message box, input box, color picker, save & open dialogs, folder navigator, etc)
translatedContent: - [x] di√°logos predefinidos (caixa de mensagem, caixa de entrada, seletor de cor, di√°logos de salvar & abrir, navegador de pastas, etc)

originContent: - [x] true colors support (24 bits per pixel) for terminals that supports it.
translatedContent: - [x] suporte a cores reais (24 bits por pixel) para terminais compat√≠veis.

originContent: AppCUI supports various backends based on the operating system it is being used for:
translatedContent: AppCUI suporta v√°rios backends baseados no sistema operacional em que est√° sendo utilizado:

originContent: * **Windows Console** - based on Win32 low level API, design for clasical windows console
translatedContent: * **Console do Windows** - baseado na API de baixo n√≠vel Win32, projetado para o console cl√°ssico do Windows

originContent: * **Windows VT** - based on ANSI sequances, designed for modern windows virtual terminals
translatedContent: * **Windows VT** - baseado em sequ√™ncias ANSI, projetado para terminais virtuais modernos do Windows

originContent: * **NCurses** - based on NCurses API for linux envinronments
translatedContent: * **NCurses** - baseado na API NCurses para ambientes Linux

originContent: * **Termios** - based on ANSI sequances and low level APIs for MAC OSX
translatedContent: * **Termios** - baseado em sequ√™ncias ANSI e APIs de baixo n√≠vel para MAC OSX

originContent: * **Web Terminal** - designed for Web implementation (based on webgl)
translatedContent: * **Terminal Web** - projetado para implementa√ß√£o na Web (baseado em webgl)

originContent: * **CrossTerm** - based on the `crossterm` crate, but enabled via a feature flag
translatedContent: * **CrossTerm** - baseado no crate `crossterm`, mas habilitado via uma flag de recurso

originContent: More on the supported backends can be found [here](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/chapter-2/backends.html)
translatedContent: Mais informa√ß√µes sobre os backends suportados podem ser encontradas [aqui](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/chapter-2/backends.html)

originContent: AppCUI-rs comes with a set of examples to help you get started. You can find them in the [examples](examples) folder, including:
translatedContent: O AppCUI-rs vem com um conjunto de exemplos para ajud√°-lo a come√ßar. Voc√™ pode encontr√°-los na pasta [examples](examples), incluindo:

originContent: - **Games** such as [Tic Tac Toe](examples/tic-tac-toe/), [Snake](examples/snake/), [Flappy Bird](examples/flappy), [Minesweeper](examples/minesweeper/), [Ram it](examples/ramit/), [PacMan](examples/games/), [Chees](examples/games/), [Connect Four](examples/games/), [2048](examples/games/) or [Tetris](examples/games/)
translatedContent: - **Jogos** como [Jogo da Velha](examples/tic-tac-toe/), [Cobra](examples/snake/), [Flappy Bird](examples/flappy), [Campo Minado](examples/minesweeper/), [Ram it](examples/ramit/), [PacMan](examples/games/), [Chees](examples/games/), [Connect Four](examples/games/), [2048](examples/games/) ou [Tetris](examples/games/)
- **Utilit√°rios** como [Calculadora](examples/calculator/), [Visualizador de CSV](examples/csv_viewer/), [Conversor de Temperatura](examples/temperature_convertor/) ou um [Timer](examples/timer/)
